attributes.action: AS IMMEDIATE EFFECT FREE RONNIE BIGGS FROM PRISON
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
FREE RONNIE BIGGS
Ronnie Biggs is held in a high security prison.He has recently had a heart attack,two strokes, speaks or communicates with great difficulty.spends 23 hours a day in his cell.I understand he also has a tube inserted in his stomach to feed him as he is unable to feed himself.I ask you Mr Brown,what danger to society is he??.Their are people convicted of sexual crimes who get smaller sentances. I will be creating groups throughout the web, and a fully run website. An old petition has now closed with only 10 names on it, why??? I ask for this new petition to get opened like it deserves.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
